user.title: Configure TCP to Event Converter
user.description: Set the TCP port (1024-65535) and event type for receiving messages.

data_description.tcp_port: Port number to listen on for incoming TCP connections (1024-65535)
data_description.event_type: Event type to fire when messages are received (lowercase, must start with letter)

error.invalid_port_range: Port number must be between 1024 and 65535
error.port_in_use: This port is already in use by another application
error.port_privileged: This port requires root/administrator privileges (ports below 1024 are privileged)
error.cannot_bind: Cannot bind to this port. It may be in use or restricted.
error.invalid_event_type: Event type must start with a lowercase letter and contain only lowercase letters, numbers, and underscores
error.port_already_configured: This port is already configured in another entry
